[{"id":"7e52693d-7970-4f39-9e22-93261a5e777f","label":"Why this web site","type":"section","object":{"label":"Why this web site","hr":false},"children":[{"id":"553f40d7-9250-4641-a26f-5ca48fd86b62","label":" ","type":"paragraph","object":{"body":"

As everyone, I have multiple facets, but one of the most dominant facet is the web development. It's my work but it's also much more than that. Here a small web site that I'll use as :

  • development sandbox within the real world
  • blog for my day to day work related experiences
    • in order to share it with my collegues
    • as memory aid
    • centralized my bookmarks
  • for hosting my online online resume

And, off-course, all of this using elasticms.

","class":"col-md-8"}},{"id":"3868362b-863a-400f-940c-78120b59e975","label":"Last posts","type":"last_updates","object":{"label":"Last posts","limit":20,"class":"col-md-4"}}]}]
description: Why this website? For my CV and for having a development sandbox
label: Homepage
search:
As everyone, I have multiple facets, but one of the most dominant facet is the web development. It's my work but it's also much more than that. Here a small web site that I'll use as :


	development sandbox within the real world
	blog for my day to day work related experiences
	
		in order to share it with my collegues
		as memory aid
		centralized my bookmarks
	
	
	for hosting my online online resume


And, off-course, all of this using elasticms.
title: Welcome on Mathieu's website
